meanings.sent1: The rocket upthrusting into the sky amazed the spectators.
meanings.sent2: She upthrusting her hand to ask a question in class.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel upthrusting its fluffy tail looked like a tiny flag waving.
meanings.sent4: The sunflowers upthrusting towards the sun symbolized hope and growth.
meanings.sent5: The diver upthrusting from the water created a beautiful arc in the air.

meanings.sent1: The sudden upthrusting of the mountain range changed the landscape forever.
meanings.sent2: The upthrusting of the tree roots cracked the pavement.
meanings.sent3: The upthrusting of the cake in the oven made it look like a delicious volcano.
meanings.sent4: The upthrusting of the skyscrapers in the city skyline was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The upthrusting of the hot air balloon filled the sky with color and wonder.
